name: Coots
description:
Coots is trapped up in space all by herself with nothing to play with. Save the day and climb the platforms as a ball of yarn to reach coots at the top. Will you be able to do it without using the cheats?

When climbing, the ball must almost reach a stop for you to drag and drop again (unless you are in space, which you could drag and drop no matter how fast you are moving), you could drag and drop from anywhere on the screen, you do not need to drag on the ball. 

There is a cheat mode in the settings, this allows you to drag and drop no matter how fast you are moving giving you the ability to fly through the level. You must either beat the game regularly or in cheat mode, when you go back to the main menu, the checkpoint is reset.
